Description: Used by a conference control client to query a conference server for its capabilities, in terms of supported messages.
Returns a list of CCMP messages supported by the specific conference server.
Used by a conference control client to query a conferencing system for its capabilities, in terms of available conference blueprints.
The blueprintsResponse returns a list of blueprints supported by the specific conference server.

Sent to retrieve the conference object associated with a
        specific blueprint.

Returns the conference object associated with a
        specific blueprint.
Used by a conference control client to query a conference server for its scheduled/active conferences.
Returns the list of the currently activated/scheduled conferences at the server.
Used to create a conference object and/or to request an operation on the conference object as a whole.
Indicates the result of the operation on the conference object as a whole.
Used to request an operation on the "user" element in the conference object.
Indicates the result of the requested operation on the "user" element in the conference object.
Used to manipulate the "users" element in the conference object, including parameters such as the "allowed-users-list", "join-handling", etc.
Indicates the result of the request to manipulate the "users" element in the conference object.
Used to retrieve the "sidebars-by-val" element of the target conference object.
Returns the list of the sidebar-by-val conferences within the target conference object.
Used to retrieve the "sidebars-by-ref" element of the target conference object.

Returns the list of the sidebar-by-ref conferences associated with the target
        conference object.
Used to request an operation on a sideber-by-val conference.
Indicates the result of the request to manipulate a sidebar-by-val conference.
Used to request an operation on a sidebar-by-ref conference.
Indicates the result of the request to manipulate a sidebar-by-ref conference.

Provides for extensibility of the CCMP message types.
        Each extension is characterized by an extensionName that MUST be included
        in the extendedRequest.

Returns the XML elements as defined for the specific
        extensionName.
